value.name: City Buying 70 Police Cars From Mountain View Ford; County Using Murfreesboro Dealer
value.description: City officials said a $1,750,000 contract has been signed with Mountain View Ford for 70 new police cars. Chief Bobby Dodd said they will be the Taurus model with a "police package." Some officers ...
